text: hak phwk khea mi yxm snxng txb cea k phung ru theid wa thæcring phwk khea ptibati tam xarmn ta khxng phwk khea theanan læa phu dı lea ca hlng phid ying pi kwa phu ptibati tam xarmn ta khxng khea doy prascak næwthang thi thuk txng ca kxallxhˌ thæ cring xallxhˌ ca mi thrng chinæa thang thi thuk txng kæ klum chn phu xthrrm
